abstract: A partnership led by the billionaire investor Carl Icahn exercised an option to buy 50.1 million shares of Federal-Mogul, the auto supplier, raising his ownership to 75 percent, according to a federal filing this week.
lead_paragraph: A partnership led by the billionaire investor Carl Icahn exercised an option to buy 50.1 million shares of Federal-Mogul, the auto supplier, raising his ownership to 75 percent, according to a federal filing this week.
